Package: org.gradle.nativebinaries.tasks

[Java] Interface ObjectFilesToBinary

      • org.gradle.api.plugins.ExtensionAware
      • All Superinterfaces:
        Task, ExtensionAware

        A task that combines a set of object files into a single binary.

          • Inherited fields 
            Fields inherited from class Fields
            interface Task TASK_ACTION, TASK_DEPENDS_ON, TASK_DESCRIPTION, TASK_GROUP, TASK_NAME, TASK_OVERWRITE, TASK_TYPE

        • Methods Summary

            Methods 
            Type Name and description
            void source(Object source)
            Adds a set of object files to be combined into the file binary.

        • Method Detail

          • public void source(Object source)

            Adds a set of object files to be combined into the file binary. The provided source object is evaluated as per Project.files.
